Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: mas
Description: A simple command line interface for the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: account
Arguments.Description: Prints the primary account Apple ID

Arguments.Name: help
Arguments.Description: Display general or command-specific help

Arguments.Name: home
Arguments.Description: Opens MAS Preview app page in a browser

Arguments.Name: info
Arguments.Description: Display app information from the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: Application
Arguments.Description: Application

Arguments.Name: install
Arguments.Description: Install an application

Arguments.Name: Application
Arguments.Description: Application

Arguments.Name: list
Arguments.Description: Lists apps from the Mac App Store which are currently installed

Arguments.Name: lucky
Arguments.Description: Install the first result from the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: Application
Arguments.Description: Application

Arguments.Name: open
Arguments.Description: Opens app page in AppStore.app

Arguments.Name: Application
Arguments.Description: Application

Arguments.Name: outdated
Arguments.Description: Lists pending updates from the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: purchase
Arguments.Description: Purchase and download free apps from the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: Application
Arguments.Description: Application

Arguments.Name: reset
Arguments.Description: Resets the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: search
Arguments.Description: Search for apps from the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: Application
Arguments.Description: Application

Arguments.Name: signin
Arguments.Description: Sign in to the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: signout
Arguments.Description: Sign out of the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: uninstall
Arguments.Description: Uninstall app installed from the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: Application
Arguments.Description: Application

Arguments.Name: upgrade
Arguments.Description: Upgrade outdated apps from the Mac App Store

Arguments.Name: vendor
Arguments.Description: Opens vendor's app page in a browser

Arguments.Name: App ID
Arguments.Description: App ID

Arguments.Name: version
Arguments.Description: Print version number
